Ana Lilian tiene fe que al incrementar su oferta dado que cuenta con mucha demanda podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana Lilian lives in an area with high pedestrian traffic. There she designs and makes book bags and uniforms. She’s well-known in her area, as everything she makes is creative, good quality and she sells at very accessible prices. Her clientele is always satisfied with her work and her unique service.
Ana always receives her clients with kindness. She is a very committed entrepreneur with the enthusiasm to get ahead. She believes that to be a grand champion, you have to think that you’re the best and if you’re not, act like you are; she’s already a champion and that’s why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will help her buy fabric and paper at wholesale prices. Ana Lilian has faith that if she increases her offerings, since she’s in great demand, she’ll be able to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: buy wholesale fabric and paper.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is 47 years old, married, and has five children. He operates a retail shop, which he has been doing for 12 years.

Daniel is requesting his first loan from KADET LTD, which he will use to purchase stocks of cooking fat, rice, and sugar.  He was introduced to KADET by a client.  Daniel hopes to expand his retail shop to wholesale.

loans.use: to purchase stock of cooking fat, rice, and sugar.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is married and has four young children. She has been farming for two years, and plans to use her loan to buy seedlings to prepare her plot for farming.  

In the future she would like to diversify the crops she plants, including planting peas, which will earn more income.

loans.use: to buy seedlings for her farm

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en: Emmanuel is 29 years old and single. He has been selling fish for two years. He wants the loan to buy more fish to sell. Emmanuel wishes to use the profits from the business to reinvest in the business because he is anticipating that his business will grow in the future.

loans.use: To buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Evans

texts.en: Evans is taking out another Kiva loan of 50,000 KES for his spare parts shop. With the loan, he wants to purchase spare tires and oil for sale. Thanks to Yehu and Kiva lenders for providing him with loans to boost his business and earn more profits.

loans.use: to purchase spare tires and oil for resale.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is a 43-year-old business man. He is married to Winfred, a business lady. They are blessed with three children, ages 21, 16 and 9. He has been running a retail shop for the past 12 years. He earns a monthly income of 10,000 KES, which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his fourth loan from KADET LTD, after repaying the previous loans successfully. Daniel will use the loan to purchase sugar, rice, and cooking oil for his store. 

With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to open a wholesale shop which will help him improve the living standard of his family.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, rice, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es:
Trinidad, trabaja elaborando papas fritas en su domicilio con ayuda de su familia para posteriormente repartirlas a las tiendas para las cuales elabora.
El crédito lo requiere para comprar papa en  cantidad  para luego procesarlas y tener más ingresos para mantener a su familia.
Trinidad, es casada y tiene dos hijos con los cuales vive en la zona Llojeta de la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Trinidad works making fried potatoes at home with help from her family to later distribute to the stores she makes them for.  She needs the loan to buy potatoes in quantity to process them and have more income to support her family.

Trinidad is married and has two children she lives with in the city of La Paz’s Llojeta zone.  This is the first time she’s worked with IMPRO and with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy potatoes in quantity.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
Lourdes trabaja como secretaria en una entidad Pública en la ciudad de La Paz.
El crédito lo requiere para pagar la operación de su madre  ya que se encuentra delicada de salud y no cuenta con muchos ingresos.
Lourdes, es soltera y no tiene hijos, vive en la casa de sus padres en la zona Alto Chijini en la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la segunda vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la segunda vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
Lourdes is employed as a secretary in a public firm in the city of La Paz.  She needs the loan to pay for her mother’s surgery who is in poor health and does not have many resources.

Lourdes is single and has no children.  She lives in her parents’ house in the city of La Paz’s Alto Chijini zone.  This is the second time she’s worked with IMPRO and second with KIVA.

loans.use: to pay for her mother's surgery.

loans.name: Carmen Claribel

texts.es: La Sra. Carmen tiene 32 años y es madre soltera con 2 hijos que son de las edades de  10 y 6 años, se dedica a la  venta de comida en su puesto de venta que se encuentra ubicado en la zona Villa Luz, este préstamo su cuarta secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Carmen va a utilizar este préstamo para compra de frízer y juego de mesas y sillas por su negocio, La razón para solicitar este préstamo es hacer crecer el negocio, la Sra. Carmen enfrenta retos en su negocio que son  la competencia en el mercado y utilizara los beneficios compra de un lote de terreno. Ya que sueña  tener casa propia para dar  comodidad a su familia, la Sra. Carmen se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Carmen, 32, is a single mother with two children, ages 10 and 6.  She works selling food in her sales stall located in the Villa Luz area.  This loan is her fourth sequence with the institution.

Carmen is going to use this loan to buy a freezer and a set of tables and chairs for her business.  The reason for the loan is to grow her business.

The challenge Carmen faces in her business is competition in the market.  She will use the profits to buy a plot of land because she dreams about having her own home to give her family comfort.  Carmen is happy and grateful to the institution for the help offered.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and a set of tables and chairs.

loans.name: Norbert

texts.en: Norbert is 35 years old. He is married and has three children between the ages of 6 and 16. All of his children go to school. He sells wood, a business he has been in for 17 years. He has requested a loan to add more wood to his inventory because the demand is very high. He plans to use the profits to build a house.

loans.use: To buy more timbers or wood for resale

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en: Saumu is a 35-year-old married woman with six children, all in school. She sells fish from her home to her neighbours and passers-by. Saumu also sells spare parts, which is her other source of income. She has been in the business for the last five years, and her primary customers are the local residents. Her greatest challenge is the high cost of transportation. She joined Yehu for their inexpensive products. She hopes to open a new kiosk in the future. She also owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Food is her major monthly expense. She intends to use the loan of 10,000 KES to buy spare parts to boost her second business.

loans.use: to buy spare parts

loans.name: Ndondy

texts.fr:
Madame  Ndondy fait parti d’un des plus anciens clients du guichet. C’est une femme battante, qui s’active dans le commerce depuis 2000. Elle a d’abord démarré son activité au marché de la place, ou elle vendait du poisson et des légumes. En rentrant chez elle  après le travail, elle était sollicitée par le voisinage  pour certains condiments qui restaient qu’elle ramenait à la maison. Finalement c’est là que lui est venue l’idée de s’installer devant chez elle pour y dresser une table, et d’y vendre la même chose. Comme cela elle pourra récupérer  toute la clientèle du quartier.
Elle a fait parti d’un groupement ou elle a été la présidente. Elle a donc une expérience dans le crédit. Pour cette fois ci, elle désire obtenir un prêt de 75000F CFA, pour aller acheter de l’huile de palme et de venir le revendre dans le quartier et sur sa table.
Ndondy est mariée et mère de famille ; elle appui son époux qui est aussi commerçant, dans la gestion de la dépense quotidienne. C’est elle qui se charge de payer les factures d’eau et d’électricité. Tout ce qu’elle fait,  participe à améliorer les conditions de vie de son foyer.
texts.en:
Ndondy is one of the branch's oldest customers. She is a spirited woman who has been working in the trade sector since 2000. She started her business selling fish and vegetables at the local market. When she would get home, her neighbours would seek her out to buy the leftover condiments that she would bring home with her. This ultimately made her decide to set up a table outside her home to sell condiments; this would allow her to reclaim all the customers in the area.

Ndondy is part of a group of which she has been the chairwoman. She therefore has experience in the area of credit. This time, she wishes to get a loan of 75 000 francs with which to buy some palm oil to resell in the neighbourhood and on the table in front of her house.

Ndondy is married and the mother of a family. She supports her husband, also a trader, with the management of their daily expenses. She is in charge of paying the water and electricity bills. Everything that she does contributes towards improving her household's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Jasmina Del Socorro

texts.es:
En el municipio de Telica departamento de león, la señora Jasmina se dedica arduamente  a laborar como maestra de primaria en un colegio de la misma localidad, actualmente esta desempeñándose como Docente en el colegio antes mencionado, dedicándose a esta labor desde hace 5 años, es Casada con 2 hijos  al que tiene que proporcionarles  las condiciones necesarias para que se desarrolle.
Una de las necesidades que la señora Jasmina atraviesa es de Mejorar su Salud, la que se encuentra un poco quebrantada, ya que debido a esta necesidad, le `permitió tomar la decisión de visitar a ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para cubrir los gastos antes mencionados, ya que por medio de este tratamiento mejoraría sus condiciones físicas , laborales y por ende familiares.
texts.en:
In Telica municipality in León department, Jasmina works hard as a primary teacher in a school in the same town. Currently she is a teacher in the aforementioned school, and has been doing this work for five years. She is married, and has two children to whom she has to provide the conditions necessary for their development.

One of the needs that Jasmina is experiencing is that of improving her health, which has deteriorated a bit. This need led her to make the decision to visit Ceprodel to apply for a loan to cover the aforementioned expenses. By means of this treatment she would improve her physical condition, her ability to work, and consequently the well-being of her family.

loans.use: To pay for medical expenses such as consultation, tests, treatment and medicines.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
Silvia, se dedica  a la venta de dulces, fideos, pan y varios artículos de la canasta familiar ya que tiene una tienda de abarrotes de la cual percibe ingresos diarios.
El crédito necesita para aumentar su capital y diversificar su tienda con más productos para obtener mayores ingresos ya que es la única fuente de trabajo que tiene para mantener  a su familia.
Silvia, es soltera y tiene un hijo con el cual vive en la casa de sus padres en la zona Villa Nueva Potosí en la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la sexta vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la segunda vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Silvia sells candy, noodles, bread and various basic staple items because she has a grocery store that produces daily income for her.  She needs the loan to increase capital and diversify the store with more products to earn higher income since this is the only source of work she has to support her family.

Silvia is single and has a son she lives with in her parents’ house in the city of La Paz’s Villa Nueva Potosí zone.  This is the 6th time she’s worked with IMPRO and second with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Fabricio Rodolfo

texts.es: Fabricio Rodolfo de veinticinco años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida en casa propia. El posee una panadería y vende pan en gran variedad dulce y salado, quesadillas, salpores, pastelitos, cachitos entre otros, últimamente ha aumentado la clientela pues todo lo elabora con material de primera calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles, además el servicio es excelente siempre recibe a las personas con una enorme sonrisa en el rostro; Fabricio es un hombre joven trabajador dispuesto a salir adelante y triunfar, tiene muchas metas por alcanzar, una de ellas es ver crecer su negocio para mantenerse adelante de la competencia, piensa que los campeones no se hacen en gimnasios, están hechos de algo inmaterial que tienen muy dentro de ellos. Es un deseo, un sueño, una visión, pensando así es como se decido a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor, azúcar, leche, levadura, etc. Fabricio Rodolfo tiene la confianza que así podrá llevar seguridad económica a su joven hogar y alzar el vuelo para que su familia viva mejor.
texts.en:
Fabricio Rodolfo, 25, lives with his life partner in his own house. He runs a bakery and sells different kinds of bread, sweet or salty, quesadillas, salpores, pastries and cachitos, among others. Lately, his clientele has increased due to the fact that he makes everything with the finest quality ingredients and sells everything at accessible prices; also, his service is excellent and he always attands to his clients with a big smile on his face.
Fabricio is a young, hard-working man, ready to get ahead and triumph. He has many goals to achieve and one of them is to see his business grow in order to stay ahead of the competition. He thinks that champions aren’t made in the gym, they’re made from something immaterial that they carry inside themselves. It’s a desire, a dream, a vision and thinking that way led him to request a loan from INTEGRAL that would help him buy wholesale flour, sugar, milk, yeast, etc. Fabricio Rodolfo is confident that this is the way to bring his household financial security and start the flight to help his family live better.

loans.use: buy wholesale flour, sugar, milk, yeast, etc.

loans.name: Monicah

texts.en:
Monicah is 32 years old and is married with two children. She has owned her clothing stall for six years now and plans to use this loan to purchase a bale of new skirts for resale.

She hopes to grow her business and own a boutique where she could sell her clothing.

loans.use: to pay for a bale of skirts.

loans.name: Francis Thuo

texts.en: Francis is applying for his second loan from KADET LTD, after repaying the previous loan successfully. Francis will use the loan to service his motorbike. With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to buy a commercial taxi.

loans.use: to service his motorbike

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy materials to make plastic decorations.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, insecticide, etc.

loans.name: Teresa Del Carmen

texts.es: Teresa del Carmen tiene 51 años de edad y habita en casa familiar junto con su hija de 16 años la cual se encuentra estudiando. Ella se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace mucho tiempo. Teresa se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora, honesta y con muchos deseos de superarse. Para ella lo más importante es su familia. No pierde las esperanzas de algún día ver a su hija convertida en una profesional y con mejores oportunidades de vida a las que ella tuvo acceso. Esto es lo que inspira a Teresa a trabajar duramente en su tienda  que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse al negocio por lo que ya logró ganarse la confianza de muchas personas. El objetivo de Teresa  es surtir su negocio de tal manera que la capacidad del mismo sea más grande y logre cubrir una mayor demanda. Esta inversión piensa hacerla por medio de un crédito ya que no cuenta con los recursos propios necesarios para hacerlo. Es por esta razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar los productos necesarios (arroz, frijoles, pan dulce, galletas, dulces, golosinas, detergente, aceite, etc.) para mantener surtido su negocio y que le permitan alcanzar su objetivo de cubrir una mayor demanda de tal forma que sus ventas e ingresos se vean incrementados y poder así dar a su familia diferentes oportunidades de vida. Tiene mucha confianza de alcanzar el objetivo trazado ya que es una mujer perseverante y siempre logra lo que se propone. La señora Teresa expresa estar muy agradecida con esta institución ya que en el pasado solicito un préstamo y le brindaron la ayuda que tanto necesitaba, gracias a ello y su excelente administración creció su negocio, espera que al igual que en el pasado le otorguen este crédito que tanta falta le hace para desarrollar mas su negocio.
texts.en:
Teresa del Carmen, 51, lives in the family home with her 16 year old daughter who is a student.  She has been a merchant for a long time.  Teresa is noted for being a hardworking, honest woman who very much wants to get ahead.  For her, her family is most important.  She does not lose hope of someday seeing her daughter become a great professional with better life opportunities than she had access to.  

This is what motivates Teresa to work hard in her store which she’s managed to set up with much effort.  She’s been in business for a long time so she’s won over the trust of many people.  Teresa’s goal is to stock the store in such a way that its capacity will be larger and she can meet greater demand.  She plans to make this investment through a loan since she does not have means of her own to do so.

Because of this she’s decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL to buy the needed products (rice, beans, sweet bread, cookies, candy, snacks, detergent, oil, etc.) to keep her store well-stocked so that she can reach her objective of meeting a greater demand so that sales and income will increase and she can give her family different life opportunities.

She is very confident that she will reach the set goal because she’s a persevering woman who always reaches what she sets out to.  Teresa says that she’s very grateful to the institution because she asked for a loan in the past and they gave her the support she so needed.  Thanks to it and to the excellent way she handled it, her business grew.  She hopes that the same way it was in the past this loan that she needs so much to develop her business more will be granted too.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Denis

texts.en:
Denis is 51 years old. He is married with six children.

Denis sells different items in his boutique, such as sugar, rice, and many more. With this loan he wants to add more items to the boutique, which he has been running for the past 10 years.

With the profits he will make more savings and he dreams to have a booming business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more foodstuffs to sell.

loans.name: Nelson Joel

texts.es: Nelson Joel tiene 27 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con sus hijos. Vive rodeado de un ecosistema muy agradable. Para Nelson lo más importante es su familia la cual es su principal inspiración para luchar día a día por un futuro mejor. Él es un hombre increíble ya que a pesar de que es un joven tiene muchas iniciativas de negocio las cuales le han dado muy buenos resultados. Nelson se dedica al cultivo de maíz y de hortalizas, flores naturales. Tiene mucha experiencia en esta actividad por lo ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchos personas en su vecindario los cuales cada día lo prefieren más.  Para él lo más importante es que sus clientes estén satisfechos con los productos  que ofrece, razón por la cual siempre está pendiente de tener los productos  en buenas condiciones. Últimamente ha notado un aumento en la demanda de sus productos y muchas veces se queda desabastecido. Por tal razón ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en  la compra de los insumos necesarios (semillas, abonos, insecticidas, regadillos, etc.) para el cultivo del maíz flores naturales y de las hortalizas con el fin de contar con una mayor producción que permita mejorar sus niveles de ventas e ingresos. Espera tener resultados positivos que le permitan accesar a una calidad de vida diferente para él y su querida familia.
texts.en:
Nelson Joel, 27, lives in his own house with his children.  He lives surrounded by a very pleasant ecosystem.  For Joel, his family is most important and is his main source of inspiration to strive daily to attain a better future.  He is an incredible man who despite his young age has many business initiatives that have produced good results for him.  

Nelson grows corn, vegetables and natural flowers.  He has much experience in this activity so has managed to win over the trust of many people in his neighborhood who prefer him more each day.  For him, what’s most important is that his customers are satisfied with the products he offers which is the reason why he’s always watchful of having his products in good conditions.

He’s noted lately that demand for his products has increased and often he has no supply available.  Because of this he’s decided to ask INTEGRAL for this loan to purchase the necessary supplies (seeds, manure, insecticide, sprinklers, etc.) for the corn, vegetable and natural flower crops in order to increase production which will lead to higher sales and income.  He hopes to have positive results that will make it possible for him to access a different quality of life for himself and for his beloved family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, insecticide, sprinklers, etc.

loans.name: Jonibek

texts.ru: Чонибек женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Он добрый и трудолюбивый молодой семьянин. Чонибек занимается выращиванием картошки и пшеницы, а также занимается скотоводством. Картофель выращивает на площади 0,6 гектар, урожайностью 200 центнер/гектар, а пшеницу на площади 4-х гектар  урожайностью 20 центнер/ гектар. Имеет 3-х голов крупного и 65 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Отходы от выращивания сельхозпродуктов идут на корм скота. В бизнесе помогает ему его жена. Чонибек запрашивает займ для покупки скота и корма для них. Он надеется на вашу помощь и щедрость.
texts.en: Jonibek is married and has two children.  He is a kind and hardworking young family man.  Jonibek is involved in growing potatoes and wheat and also in animal husbandry.  He grows potatoes on 0.6 hectares of land that provides a harvest yield of 200 centners or 20,000 kilograms per hectare, and wheat on 4 hectares with a yield of 20 centners or 2000 kilograms per hectare.  Jonibek has 3 heads of cattle and 65 heads of small livestock.  The leftovers from growing agricultural crops go toward feeding livestock.  His wife helps him with this business.  Jonibek is requesting this loan to buy livestock and livestock feed.  He relies on your help and generosity.

loans.use: to buy livestock and livestock feed

loans.name: Zaida

texts.es: La Sra. Zaida tiene 36 años  y es madre soltera con 2 hijos  que son de las edades de 7 y 12 años ella se dedica  a la venta de  gaseosas en un local que se encuentran en sexto anillo, donde también tiene una rockola donde ofrece servicio de entretenimiento a sus clientes con música que ellos escogen, el préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución y  va a usar este préstamo  para la compra  de sillas y mesas de plástico para su negocio, la  razón para solicitar este préstamo es la necesidad de comprar cosas nuevas para dar comodidad a sus clientes, la Sra. Zaida  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son seguir creciendo y  utilizara los beneficios en brindar un mejor servicio a su clientela, la Sra. Zaida es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Zaida is 36 years old and the single mother of two children, ages 7 and 12.  She sells soft drinks from a stand located in the sixth ring.  She also has a rockola, where she provides entertainment to her customers, with music of their own choosing.  This loan will be her first through the institution and she will use the money to buy plastic tables and chairs for her business.  She is asking for this loan because she needs to buy new things to make her customers more comfortable.  Zaida faces challenges in her business, such as growth.  She will use these benefits to provide better service to her customers.  Zaida is a hardworking person and she is happy and grateful to the institution for its support.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es: Alejandro  de 59 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañera de vida. Él  posee un molino de nixtamal el cual es su principal herramienta para trabajar y ganarse el pan de cada día. Muchas personas solicitan su servicio dado que les facilita sus tareas ya que en el molino del señor Alejandro pueden moler diferentes granos como: maíz, frijoles, arroz y café. Además los clientes expresan estar muy satisfechos con el trato y servicio que reciben. Esto ha permitido que muchas personas lo prefieran y sigan solicitando su servicio. Con mucho trabajo y dedicación ha logrado mantener este negocio a flote aunque últimamente ha notado algunas fallas en el molino ya que por el uso requiere de algunas reparaciones y cambio de repuestos. Esto es lo que ha llevado a Alejandro a acercarse a INTEGRAL para solicitar crédito que le permita invertir en la compra  de un motor nuevo que reemplace el viejo, discos nuevos y poleas. Todo esto lo hace con el fin de seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientes ya que sin esta herramienta no podría seguir trabajando para ganarse la vida y suplir las necesidades de su hogar. Está muy agradecido con esta institución ya que en el pasado recibió ayuda cuando más lo necesitaba, espera que en esta ocasión sea igual por el bienestar de los suyos.
texts.en:
Alejandro, 59, lives in his own house with his life companion.  He owns a corn mill that’s his main work tool to earn his daily bread.  Many people seek out his services because it makes their work easier; in Alejadro’s mill they can grind various kinds of grains like corn, beans, rice and coffee.  Besides, the customers say that they are very satisfied with the treatment and service they receive.  This has led to his being preferred by many people who continue to request his services.

He’s managed to keep the business afloat with much work and dedication even though he’s noticed lately that the mill is starting to have some breakdowns due to the constant use and it needs some repairs and to have some parts replaced.

This is what’s led Alejandro to call on INTEGRAL to request a loan to buy a new motor to replace the old one, new discs and pulleys.  He does all this aiming at continuing to provide good service to his customers because without this tool he would not be able to continue earning his livelihood and meeting household needs.  

He is very grateful to this institution because he got help in the past when he most needed it.  He hopes for his loved ones’ wellbeing that on this occasion it will be the same.

loans.use: to buy a gasoline engine, discs and new pulleys.

loans.name: Teo

texts.en:
Teo lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with four children, all of whom are in school. She has two additional family members (her brother and sister).

Teo operates a retail shop from home. She also sells fruits and vegetables. She has been in this business for the last year, and she works six days a week.

Teo has requested a loan of 500,000 Uganda shillings (UGX) from MCDT SACCO to buy boxes of oranges, pineapples, and mangoes. Her major business challenges are lack of customers and transportation.

Her goals and aspirations include building a house. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity but does not have access to piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees, rent, and food.

loans.use: To buy more fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Prossy

texts.en:
Prossy is 22 years old and lives in the town of Nasana in the Kampala west region of Uganda. For the past three years, Prossy has been working hard to manage her retail shop, which sells sugar and soap. 

To help expand her business, Prossy is requesting a loan for 200,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda, which she will use to buy more commodities. The loan will help Prossy generate increased profits, which she will use to take care of her siblings. Prossy hopes that in the future she will be able to expand her business. 

Prossy is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities and a forum for life-skills training. The ELA program has increased Prossy's future prospects by giving her a loan that has improved her business.

loans.use: to purchase more commodities.

loans.name: Aidah

texts.en:
Aidah is 21 years old and lives in the town of Nasana in the Kampala west region of Uganda. She is married and has 3 children who are all currently in school. For the past year, Aidah has been working hard to manage her small business, which sells fish. 

To help expand her business, Aidah has requested a loan of 200,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more fish for resale, and will help Aidah to generate greater profits and pay her children's school fees. Aidah hopes that in the future she will be able to buy a plot of land and build a house on it. 

Aidah is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training. The ELA program has increased Aidah's future prospects by helping her to improving her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish for resale.

loans.name: Rose's Group

texts.en:
Rose's group is comprised of two hard working women. Rose is 22 years old and lives in the town of Nasana in the Kampala west region of Uganda. She is single and has 2 children, one of which is currently in school. For the past year, Rose has been working hard to manage her small market, which sells vegetables. 

To help expand her business, Rose has requested a loan of 200,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more vegetables for resale, and will help Rose to generate greater profits and pay medical expenses. Rose hopes that in the future she will be able to buy a plot of land and build a house on it. 

Rose is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training. The ELA program has increased Rose's future prospects by helping her to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Rahimberdi

texts.ru: Рахимберди трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Более 15 лет Рахимберди занимается купле- продажей скота. Он ухаживает и откармливает скот дома. Кроме того он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Также отходы от выращивания культур идут на корм скота. От полученной прибыли он хочет отремонтировать свой дом. Рахимберди запрашивает займ для покупки крупного рогатого скота.
texts.en: Rahimberdi is a hardworking and kind person.  He has been involved in buying and selling livestock for over 15 years.  He takes care of and fattens up livestock at home.  Besides this, he is involved in growing agricultural crops.  The leftovers from growing crops go toward feeding livestock.  He wants to use the resulting profit to repair his house.  Rahimberdi is requesting this loan to buy cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Lukhmonjon

texts.ru: На протяжении 10 лет Лухмонджон занимается купле- продажей скота. Он женат и на воспитании имеет одного ребенка. Также Лухмонджон занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов, и отходы от них идут на корм скота. От полученной прибыли он намерен ремонтировать свой дом. Лухмонджон запрашивает займ для покупки двух голов мелкого рогатого скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Lukhmonjon has been involved in buying and selling livestock for ten years.  He is married and has one child.  Lukhmonjon is also involved in growing agricultural crops, the leftovers from which go toward livestock feed.  He intends to use the resulting profit to repair his house.  Lukhmonjon is requesting this loan to buy two heads of small livestock.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Abdourahmane

texts.fr:
Monsieur Abdourahmane âgé de 31 ans, est enseignant de profession. Il est marié et père de famille. Pour faire fasse à la cherté de la vie actuelle, il s’active parallèlement dans l’élevage et la revente de moutons ou il a acquis une expérience de 7 ans depuis lors. Il est à son 2ème  crédit et il veut un renouvellement de 250.000FCFA  pour pouvoir acheter  20 moutons à 12500FCFA l’un.
Monsieur Abdourahmane s’occupe de sa famille et de leurs besoins vitaux quotidiens.
Il souhaite dans l’avenir augmenter son chiffre d’affaire et être régulier dans ses ventes.
texts.en:
Abdourahmane is 31 years old and is a teacher by profession. He is married and the father of a family. So that he is able to cope with the current high price of living, he also breeds and resells sheep, an area in which he has since built up 7 years experience.

This is Abdourahmane's 2nd loan and he wishes to get a renewal of 250 000 francs so that he can buy 20 sheep costing 12 500 francs each. Abdourahmane takes care of his family and their daily needs. In future, he would like to increase his revenue and make regular sales.

loans.use: to buy sheep for breeding and resale.

loans.name: Reynaldo Ovidio

texts.es: Reynaldo Ovidio de 33 años de edad habita en casa familiar junto con sus padres. Él se dedica al cultivo de cereales y hortalizas desde hace muchos años. Es un hombre muy trabajador que se caracteriza por ser responsable, dedicado y emprendedor. Cada año realiza esta actividad ya que  es su principal fuente de ingresos y es lo que le permite llevar el pan de cada día a sus padres. Para él lo más importante es que su familia este en mejores condiciones a las que tiene actualmente y eso es lo que lo motiva a trabajar duramente  para poder cambiar la realidad que viven él y su familia. Este año al igual que los anteriores quiere cultivar la tierra y sacar la cosecha que le permite llevar lo necesario a su hogar. Dado que no cuenta con recursos propios para comprar los insumos agrícolas necesarios para la siembra, ha tomado  la decisión de acercarse a esta institución, INTEGRAL, para solicitar crédito y así poder  comprar  lo necesario para el cultivo como: semillas, abonos, regadillos y venenos para control de plagas. De tal forma que esto le permita seguir  cultivando la tierra que con tanto amor y esperanzas realiza. Confía en Dios todo poderoso que de esta forma su situación económica  y la de su familia mejorarán.
texts.en:
Reynaldo Ovidio, 33, lives in the family home with his parents.  He has farmed cereals and vegetables for many years.  He is a very hardworking man who is noted for being responsible, dedicated and enterprising.  

He carries out this activity every year; it’s his main source of income that makes it possible for him to provide daily bread for his parents.  For him, what’s most important is that his family be in better conditions than their current ones and this is what motivates him to work hard to change the reality he and his family live in.  

This year, just like the previous ones, he wants to till the land to produce a harvest that will make it possible for him to bring what’s necessary home.  Because he does not have his own resources to buy the farm supplies he needs for the crops, he’s decided to call on INTEGRAL to request a loan to buy the necessary farm supplies like seeds, manure, sprinklers and poison to control infestations.  

In this way he will be able to continue farming the land which he does with so much love and hope.  He trusts in God Almighty that his and his family’s economic situation will improve this way.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, sprinkers and poison to control infestations.

loans.name: Sonia Guadalupe

texts.es: Sonia Guadalupe de 43 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo e hijos. Ella se dedica al comercio de tamales y pastelitos fritos rellenos de carne y verdura. Su negocio está ubicado en su hogar de habitación el cual está en una de las calles principales donde ella habita. Además algunas veces realiza la venta en el mercado municipal de la zona donde ella habita. Trabaja muy duro para poder contribuir un poco con la economía del hogar ya que lo que su esposo gana no alcanza a cubrir las principales necesidades que cada día son mayores. Tiene la ventaja que muchas personas la prefieren por ser una mujer carismática, higiénica y muy responsable. Ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas en la zona.  Ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio ya que quiere cubrir una mayor demanda de mercado para que de esta forma pueda mejorar sus ventas y niveles de ingresos. Esto la llevo a presentarse a INTEGRAL para solicitar este crédito para invertir en la materia prima necesaria (maíz, pollo, verduras, sal, etc.) para la producción de los ricos tamales y pastelitos que cada día son más las personas interesadas en comprar. Es una mujer de metas y tiene mucho optimismo que con esta decisión logrará lo que tanto desea: mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Sonia Guadalupe, 43, lives in her own house with her husband and children.  She’s a tamales and meat and vegetable stuffed fried turnovers merchant.  Her business is located at home which is located on one of the main streets where she lives.  Sometimes she also sells at the local market. 

She works very hard to contribute a little to household economy because what her husband earns is insufficient to cover the main needs which every day are larger.  Her advantage is that many people prefer her because she’s a charismatic, hygienic, very responsible woman.  She’s succeeded in winning over the trust of many people in her zone.

She’s decided to invest in her business because she wants to meet greater market demand so that she can improve sales and income levels.  This led her to come by INTEGRAL to request this loan to buy raw materials needed (corn, chicken, vegetables, salt, etc.) to make the delicious tamales and turnovers that people are interested in buying more every day.

She is a woman with goals and is very optimistic that through this decision she will reach what she so desires: to improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: Para comprar: maíz, pollo, verduras, sal, etc.  to buy corn, chicken, vegetables, salt, etc.

loans.name: Camino De Victoria 1 Group

texts.en:
Carmen is the coordinator of her group Camino de Victoria (Road to Victory). Carmen's group is located in Santiago, an area known for tobacco and beef production. Santiago is the second biggest city in the Dominican Republic. The group members are dedicated to selling cloth, food, shoes and many other miscellaneous products. 

Carmen lives in a simple structure with one of her two children and her long term partner. She said her most difficult challenge has been to travel and visit her family living in other countries. One of her most favorite things to do is to watch telenovelas.

Carmen is excited about her 3th loan with Esperanza. She has had her business for approximately 7 years, starting with her own resources. She plans to use this loan to invest in her Cafeteria where she sells sandwiches, natural fruit juices and shakes, and other snacks. With this loan, she will be able to expand her business by buying bread, ham, cheese, catchup, snacks, sugar, milk and fruit. 

She will use the profits to buy a refrigerator and chairs for her business. She wants to see her children become professionals - this is one of her dreams. Carmen thanks all of you for your support.

loans.use: To buy bread, ham, cheese, catchup, snacks, sugar and fruit.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama is married and has 5 children. Ama cooks rice and bean stew to sell at Enyinase, near Elmina. She has been in this business for 5 years. Ama uses her income to support her husband and to feed, clothe, and pay school fees for her children. She will use her loan to purchase bags of rice and beans to prepare her food for sale. With the new profit, Ama plans to build a better stall for the sale of her food.

loans.use: purchase bags of rice and beans to prepare stew for sale.

loans.name: Marie

texts.fr: Marie est une femme mariée.Elle est mère de 5 enfants dont les deux vont à l'école primaire.Depuis près de 15 ans, Marie exerce un commerce de produits cosmétiques, de tissus et de chaussures.Auparavant, elle vendait des beignets. Fatiguée par des crises d'asthme à cause de la fumée, elle va arrêter pour aller travailler à l'hôtel qu'elle va aussi quitter après 6 mois. Le commerce de produits cosmétiques lui rapporte aujourd'hui assez de revenus pour se prendre en charge et prendre en charge certains besoins de ses enfants. Elle parvient également à soutenir son mari dans les dépenses alimentaires de la famille. Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un  pret de 200000f pour acheter des lait de beauté, des parfums, des mèches et des chaussures. Elle ambitionne d'implanter une boutique au marché pour mieux écouler s marchandise.
texts.en:
Marie is a married woman. She is the mother of 5 children, 2 of whom attend primary school. For about 15 years, Marie has sold cosmetic products, fabrics and shoes. Previously, she sold donuts. Worn out by asthma attacks caused by the smoke, she stopped that to go and work in a hotel, a job which she also left after 6 months.
The sale of cosmetic products today brings her enough income to cover her own expenses, and to meet some of her childrens' needs. She also manages to help her husband with the food costs for the family.
In order to increase her working capital, she is seeking a loan of 200,000f to purchase beauty creams, perfumes, hairpieces and shoes. Her ambition is to open a boutique at the market in order to increase her sales.

loans.use: to purchase beauty creams, perfumes, hairpieces and shoes.

loans.name: Diatou

texts.fr: Diatou est une femme qui s'active dans la vente de tissus et d'habits pour enfants. Elle est mariée et est mère de deux enfants.Ce commerce qu'elle exerce depuis deux ans  lui permet de subvenir à ses propres besoins et à ceux de ses enfants.Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un pret de 200000f pour acheter des vêtements et des tissus.Son ambition est de s'engager dans la friperie.
texts.en:
Diatou is a woman who sells fabrics and childrens' outfits. She is married and the mother of two children. This business, which she has operated for the last two years, enables her to meet her own expenses and those of the children. In order to increase her stock of product, she is seeking a loan of 200,000f to buy clothing and fabrics. 
Her ambition is to get involved in secondhand clothing.

loans.use: to buy clothing and fabrics

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es: Blanca Lidia de 42 años de edad, reside en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañero de vida de 46 años y su hija de 14 años de edad en zona semiurbana. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad. Gracias a su arduo trabajo ha logrado establecer una pequeña tiendita en su hogar de residencia. Blanca es una mujer emprendedora llena de metas y sueños. Para ella lo más importante es su familia la cual la impulsa a seguir adelante y trabajar duramente para darles lo necesario. Últimamente ha estado pensando mucho en la manera de hacer crecer su negocio ya que este es su principal fuente de ingresos y piensa seguir manteniéndolo activo y recibiendo los frutos que hasta el momento ha recibido. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de productos de tienda como: frijoles, arroz, azúcar, aceite, pan dulce, huevos, golosinas, etc. Para surtir su negocio con el fin de atraer a más clientes que le permitan aumentar su nivel de ventas e ingresos de tal manera que su calidad de vida y la de su familia se vea mejorada.
texts.en:
Blanca Lidia, 42, lives in a semi urban zone in a house that’s hers with her 46 year old life companion and her 14 year old daughter.  She sells basic staple items.  Thanks to her hard work she’s managed to set up a small store at home. 

Blanca is an enterprising woman who is full of goals and dreams.  For her, what’s most important is her family who she pushes to continue moving forward and works hard to give them everything necessary.

She’s lately been thinking much about ways of making her business grow because it’s her main source of income and she intends to keep it active and receiving fruits from it like she’s been doing so far.  This is the reason for asking INTEGRAL for this loan to buy merchandise for the store like beans, rice, sugar, oil, sweet bread, eggs, snacks, etc. to stock the store and attract more customers that will cause her sales levels to increase in such a way that her and her family’s quality of life will see improvement.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Volimata

texts.fr: Madame  Volimata est femme de 44 ans qui vit au Sénégal. Elle est mariée  et mère de 7 enfants dont l’âgé varie entre 1 et 22 ans. Elle s’active dans le secteur du  commerce  et de la petite restauration. Elle vend le petit déjeuner  et le diner dans le quartier ou elle habite. Parallèlement  elle commercialise des tissus et des sacs.  L’unique raison du choix de son activité est qu’elle veut assister son mari face aux charges familiales. C’est  aussi pourquoi  elle s’intéresse  beaucoup aux bénéfices que lui procure son activité et a la satisfaction des besoins de ses clients. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis octobre 2009. Elle sollicite un crédit de 150 000 frs prévu pour s’approvisionner en denrées alimentaires qui lui permettent de préparer  le petit déjeuner et le dîner qu’elle commercialise. Une autre partie de l’argent servira à acheter  quelques sacs et chaussures qui seront destinés a la vente. Son objectif est de développer son activité, d’accroitre ses bénéfices afin de mieux participer a l’amélioration des conditions de vie sociale de sa famille.
texts.en:
Volimata is a 44-year-old woman who lives in Senegal. She is married and the mother of 7 children aged between 1 and 22 years. Volimata works as a vendor and also has a snack business. She sells breakfast and dinner in the area where she lives. She also sells fabrics and bags. The only reason for her choice to go into business is that she wants to help husband meet their family responsibilities. This is also why she is very interested in the profits generated by her business and therefore in satisfying her customers' needs.

Volimata has been a member of a UIMCEC branch since October 2009. She is requesting a loan of 150 000 francs to be used to buy the ingredients she needs to make the meals that she sells. Part of the loan will also be used to buy shoes and bags destined for resale. Her aim is to develop her business and increase her profits in order to be able to contribute more to improving her family's social living conditions.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs, shoes and bags for her business.

loans.name: María Ángela

texts.es: María Ángela de 56  años de edad, vive en su propia casa junto a su querida familia. María se dedica a la producción y venta de pan. Su negocio está establecido en su hogar de residencia que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado mantener  durante muchos años, ya son varios años de ofrecer delicias de pan como semitas rellenas de jaleas de piña, reposterias, salpores de arroz y almidon, por mencionar algunas de sus especialidades. Muchas personas la prefieren por ser una mujer muy amable, trabajadora, higiénica y muy carismática. Ella ha trabajado toda su vida para sacar adelante a su familia ya que es lo más importante y es quien le da las fuerzas para seguir luchando. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL con el fin de comprar la materia prima para la elaboración del delicioso pan dulce que cada mañana prepara. Con él crédito piensa comprar insumos como: harinas, azucares, canela, colorantes, leche, huevos, margarinas y mantecas. Todo esto lo hace con el fin de lograr mejores niveles de venta e ingresos que  por consecuencia lleven a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
María Ángela, 56, lives in her own house with her beloved family.  María works baking and selling bread.  Her business is home-based and with much effort has managed to keep it in operation for many years.  She’s been offering delicious types of bread like: pineapple jelly filled “semitas” [sweet loaves with a texture similar to that of Kaiser rolls], pastries, “salpores de arroz y almidón” [type of cookie similar to shortbread] to mention just a few of her specialties.

Many people prefer her because she’s a kind, hardworking, hygienic and very charismatic woman.  She’s worked her entire life to support her family since they are the most important and what gives her the strength to carry on.

She’s decided to ask INTEGRAL for this loan to buy raw materials to make the delicious sweet bread she makes every morning.  She will use the loan to buy flour, sugar, cinnamon, food coloring, milk, eggs, margarine and shortening.  She does all this aiming at reaching higher sales and income levels leading to improved quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her bakery.

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr: Aïssé est une femme mariée , mère de 4 enfants dont les 3 vont à l'école. Elle vend du poisson fumé à domicile.Elle s'approvisionne chaque mois dans le grand marché sous régional de Diaobé, à l'est du pays.Elle arrive à générer des bénéfices qui lui servent à la prise en charge des besoins alimentaires et vestimentaires de ses enfants. Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un pret de 150000f pour acheter du poisson fumé.Son ambition est d'implanter une cantine au marché central de sa localité pour mieux écouler ses produits.
texts.en:
Aïssé is a married mother of 4 children, 3 of whom attend school. She sells smoked fish door to door. She buys her product each month in the local 'grand marché' in Diaobé, in the east of the country. She manages to make a profit, which she is able to use to cover the food and clothing costs for her children.
In order to increase her working capital, she is seeking a loan of 150,000f to purchase smoked fish. Her ambition is to open a canteen at her local central market in order to increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy smoked fish.

loans.name: María Cruz

texts.es: María Cruz de cuarenta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa propia. Ella posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad , arroz, frijoles, leche, pan, huevos, entre otros, es muy conocida en la zona pues tiene su tienda bien surtida y siempre satisface a su clientela, además los productos que comercia son de primera calidad y los vende a precios accesibles; María es una mujer emprendedora muy honrada y con mucho entusiasmo de salir adelante, piensa que nunca hay que desistir de un sueño, sólo tratar de ver las señales que te lleven a él, es así como se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, productos instantáneos, bebidas, etc. María tiene la confianza que de esta forma podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Cruz, 49, lives with her spouse and son in her own house.  She has a store where she sells basic staple items like rice, beans, milk, bread and eggs, among others.  She’s very well known in her zone because her store is well-stocked and she always meets customer needs.  Besides, the products she sells are of first quality and she sells them at affordable prices.  

María is an enterprising, honest woman who is very enthusiastic about getting ahead.  She believes that one must never lose sight of one’s dream and always be on the lookout for signs leading to it.  This is how she decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan to buy basic grains, snacks, instant products, soft-drinks, etc. María is confident that she will be able to give her family a better quality of life this way.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: David Armando

texts.es: David Armando de treinta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos. El posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad  frijoles, huevos, leche, jabón, entre otros, últimamente ha aumentado su demanda pues todos los productos que comercia son de primera calidad y los vende a precios realmente accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable siempre se encuentra a la orden del día, para todo el que visita su negocio; David es un hombre emprendedor y muy dedicado a su labor, siempre aprovecha las oportunidades que se le presentan; piensa que cuando alguien desea algo debe saber que corre riesgos y por eso la vida vale la pena, él quiere correr el riesgo por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, pan, producto instantáneo, jabón incrementar así su variedad de productos y oportunidades de mejorar sus ventas. David Armando tiene fe que así podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
David Armando, 32, lives with his spouse and children.  He has a store where he sells basic staple items like beans, eggs, milk and soap, among others.  Demand has increased lately because all of the products he sells are of first quality and he sells them at affordable prices.  Besides, service is unequalled and he’s always ready to serve everyone who visits his store.

David is an enterprising man who is very dedicated to his work.  He always takes advantage of opportunities that arise.  He believes that when someone wants to accomplish something he must face risks but that’s why life’s worth living.  He wants to take a risk so is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy basic grains, snacks, bread, instant products and soap to increase the variety of his stock and opportunities to make sales.  David Armando has faith that he will be able to give his family a fulfilled life this way.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Faustina

texts.en: Faustina lives together with her husband and four children at Enyinase near Elmina. She sells secondhand children's and ladies wear; she has been selling secondhand clothes for eight years now. She uses her income to support her husband in paying their utility bills. Faustina needs this loan to purchase more secondhand ladies and children's wear to sell. With the new profits Faustina plan to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more secondhand ladies and children's wear to sell

loans.name: Florence

texts.en: Florence cooks kenkey for sale. (Kenkey is fermented corn dough wrapped in corn or banana leaves.) She serves it with fried fish, pepper and tomato sauce at Enyinase, near Elmina. She is married and has six dependents. Her husband is a contractor. Florence has been into this business for five years now. She uses her income for the gerneral upkeep of their children. Florence will use her loan to purchase bags of maize and fish which she uses in preparing her kenkey for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her expanded business to mount a better stall for the sale of her kenkey.

loans.use: to purchase bags of maize and fish for use in preparing her kenkey for sale

loans.name: José Andrés

texts.es: José Andrés de cincuenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida en zona semiurbana del país; el posee un molino y una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad como granos básicos,  bebidas, jabones entre otros, es muy conocido en la zona, pues tiene en sus negocios lo que los clientes necesitan, además de que lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles y el servicio es único, los atiende a la perfección; José es un hombre trabajador  con muchas metas a futuro, piensa que el mundo está en manos de aquellos que tienen el coraje de soñar y de correr el riesgo de vivir sus sueños, él tiene ese coraje es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, pan , huevos, bebidas, y mantenimiento de molino, comprando discos y poleas nuevas. José Andrés tiene la esperanza que así logrará para su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José Andrés, 51, lives with his spouse in a semi urban area of the country.  He owns a mill and a grocery store where he sells basic staple items like basic grains, soft-drinks and soap, among others.  He is very well-known in the zone because he has what customers need in his businesses.  Besides, what he sells is very good quality and he sells it at affordable prices and he’s the only one providing the service.  He tends to them to perfection.

José is a hardworking man with many future goals.  He believes that the world is in the hands of those who are brave enough to dream and take risks to live their dreams.  He has that courage and this is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy basic grains, snacks, bread, eggs and soft-drinks and to service his mill buying discs and new pulleys.  José Andrés hopes that he’ll attain a better quality of life for his family this way.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store and to buy spare parts for and service his mill.

loans.name: Adelina

texts.es: Adelina de sesenta y uno años de edad vive junto a sus dos hijos en casa propia, Ella posee un comedor y una pequeña tienda en el lugar donde reside, tiene una excelente ubicación su negocio, vende gran variedad de platillos exquisitos carne asada, pollo, arroz, sopa, entre otros, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todo lo que elabora, es hecho con material de primera calidad, con mucha higiene y lo vende a precios accesibles, además el servicio es excelente; Adelina es una mujer muy enérgica a pesar de su edad siempre se encuentra activa en el trabajo, nunca desaprovecha las oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa que lo más importante para llegar al éxito es la perseverancia y el amor a la labor, es así como se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar carnes, verduras, granos básicos, bebidas, etc  a fin de poder abastecer a clientes que de los alrededores le visitan. Adelina tiene la confianza que así podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Adelina, 61, lives in her own house with her two children. She has an eatery and small store at home.  Her business is excellently located.  She sells a wide variety of dishes like grilled meat, chicken, rice and soup, among others.  She has acquired a large clientele because everything she makes is made with top quality ingredients with much cleanliness and she sells it at affordable prices; besides service is excellent.

Adelina is a very energetic woman despite her age who is always active at work.  She never lets opportunities pass her by because she believes that the most important thing to reach success is perseverance and love of work.  This is what led her to ask INTEGRAL for a loan to buy meat, vegetables, basic grains, soft-drinks, etc. to supply customers who visit her from surrounding areas.  Adelina trusts that she will be able to bring home economic security this way.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, basic grains and soft-drinks.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba sells dried pepper at Enyinase, near Elmina, which she has done for three years now. She is married to a farmer and has seven dependents. Aba use her income to help her husband pay their accomodation and utility bills. Aba will use her loan to purchase sacks of dry pepper to sell. With the new profits she will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of dried peppers to sell

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua is a fish monger at Enyinase, near Elmina. She smokes fish for sale. She has been in this business for 15 years now. Efua is marrried to a farmer and has five dependance. Efua assists her husband in feeding and clothing their children. Efua will use her loan to purchase more fish which she will smoke for sale. With the new profits, she will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish which she will smoke for sale.

loans.name: Luis Ernesto

texts.es: Luis Ernesto de cuarenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, el posee una venta de tortas y pupusas, es muy conocido en la zona pues tiene la venta de comida más rica del lugar, sus clientes siempre quedan satisfechos, el prepara todo con material de primera calidad y lo vende a precios bajos además el servicio es inigualable siempre recibe a las personas muy cordial; Luis es un hombre honrado y muy trabajador, siempre aprovecha cada oportunidad que se le presenta porque sabe que solo así podrá llegar a el éxito, piensa que cuanto más duro trabaja más vale la pena lo que hace, últimamente ha experimentado un incremento en su demanda, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pan, carne, queso, frijoles, chicharrón, verduras, etc. Luis Ernesto tiene la esperanza que abasteciendo de mayor variedad y cantidad de sus comidas hará que sus ventas incrementen y así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luis Ernesto, 41, lives with his spouse and their children.  He sells tortas [Latin American sandwich] and pupusas [stuffed, grilled corn cakes].  He’s very well known in the zone because his food is the most delicious in the area; his customers are always satisfied.  He prepares everything with top quality ingredients and sells it at low prices; besides service in unequalled; he always receives people very cordially.

Luis is an honest, very hardworking man.  He takes advantage of every opportunity that arises because he knows that this is the only way to attain success.  He believes that the harder work is the more the effort he puts into it is worth.

He’s had an increase in demand lately and this is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy bread, meat, cheese, beans, pork, vegetables, etc.  Luis Ernesto hopes that stocking a greater variety and amount of food will cause his sales to increase and he will be able to give his family a better quality of life this way.

loans.use: to buy meat, cheese, beans, pork, vegetables and soft-drinks.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es: Manuel de Jesús habita en casa de su propiedad a lado de su querida familia en zona rural del país. Él se dedica al cultivo y comercio de granos básicos como: maíz y frijoles. Cada año repite esta actividad, siembra la semilla, saca la cosecha y por último pone  a la venta una gran parte de ella. De esta forma se gana la vida y cabe aclarar que es su principal fuente de ingresos. No cuenta con terreno propio para cultivar la tierra por lo que cada año alquila unas manzanas de tierra para poder continuar realizando sus siembras que son los que le han permitido hasta hoy: crecer y alimentar a su familia. Manuel se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, honrado y muy responsable. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias de él y confían en el producto que comercializa. Ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución, INTEGRAL, para solicitar credito y comprar los principales insumos agrícolas (semillas, pestisidas, abonos, etc.) y alquilar mayor cantidad de tierra que en años anteriores a fin de pretender obtener mayor cantidad de productos. Confía en Dios todo poderoso que obtendrá resultados favorables y podrá lograr su sueño de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel de Jesus lives in house of his own next to his beloved family in a rural area of the country. He makes his living from the cultivation and trade of grains like corn and beans. Every year he repeats this process, planting the seed, harvesting the crop, and finally placing the majority of it on sale. This is how he makes a living and it should be clear that this is his main source of income. He does not have his own land to farm, so every year he rents a few more sections of land to continue to produce his crops, which are what have allowed him to achieve today: to grow and feed his family.

Manuel is known for being a hard worker, honorable, and very responsible. Many people give him good references and trust the product he sells. He has decided to work with this institution, INTEGRAL, to request a loan to buy his main agricultural supplies (seeds, pesticides, fertilizers, etc.) and to rent more land than in previous years in order to produce more crops. He trusts in the almighty God that he will get good results and that he can can achieve his dream of improving the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, pesticides, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es: Manuel de Jesús de 30 años de edad, habita junto a su familia en casa familiar. El posee un molino de nixtamal el cual atiende junto con su familia, moliendo maiz, frijoles, salsas, chocolate, granos secos, entre otros. El se caracteriza por ser un hombre emprendedor, honrado, justo y sobre todo trabajador. Se ha ganado la confianza de muchas personas en su vecindario ya que para él lo más importante es que sus clientes estén satisfechos con el servicio que reciben.  Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado mantener a flote su negocio y es así como lo quiere mantener por mucho más tiempo, ya que con los ingresos percibidos pueden suplir muchas de sus necesidades que cada día son mayores. Ha notado que con el tiempo el molino necesita algunas reparaciones y cambios de repuestos, ya que si no se le da mantenimiento podría fallar en cualquier momento y dejar de  prestar el servicio. A toda costa quiere evitar que su molino se arruine por completo por lo que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de repuestos para su molino, con el fin de seguir prestando el buen servicio que hasta el momento ha dado a sus clientes. Espera que los resultados de esta decisión sean favorables ya que es una de sus principales fuentes de ingresos y sin el dinero que ingresa del molino la situación sería demasiado difícil dado que la situación económica cada día es mas demandante.
texts.en:
At 30 years old, Manuel de Jesús lives together with his family in the family home.  He owns a corn mill which he runs along with his family, grinding corn, beans, salsas, chocolate, and dry grains among others things.  

He is characterized by being an enterprising, honest, fair, and especially hard-working man.  He has earned the trust of many people in his neighborhood because the most important thing to him is that his clients are satisfied with the service they receive.  With a lot of effort he has managed to keep his business afloat and this is how he would like to keep it for a long time, so that with the income he earns they can meet many of their needs which are greater every day.  

He has noticed that over time the mill needs some repairs and part changes, so much so that if not given maintenance it could fail to work at any time and stop the service.  At all costs he wants to prevent the mill from completely ruining itself which is why he decided to ask for this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in the purchase of spare parts for his mill, and in order to continue offering the good service that up until now he has given his clients.

He hopes that the results of this decision are favorable since it is one of his main sources of income and without the money he earns from the mill the circumstances would be too difficult, given that the financial situation is more demanding each day.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his corn mill.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es: Manuel de Jesús de sesenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida, el posee una venta de ropa y otros artículos varios, que de forma ambulante promueve en principales calles, parques y mercados cercanos a su casa; últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles, en estas vacaciones quieren aprovechar para que aumenten sus ventas por eso surtirán más el negocio; Manuel es un hombre visionario, dispuesto a alcanzar el éxito, piensa que lo que importa es cuanto amor ponemos en el trabajo que realizamos, para que así sea más grande la felicidad, ya ha manejado creditos y es muy buen cliente, es así como se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor y otros artículos de uso personal como calzonetas, sandalias, bloqueadores solares, antitranspirantes, lociones. Manuel de Jesús tiene la confianza que incrementando la variedad de sus productos sus ventas se elevarán y así podrar elevar el nivel de vida de su querida familia
texts.en:
Manuel de Jesús, 66, lives with his spouse.  He sells clothes and other varied products.  He is a street vendor along the main streets, parks and markets near his house.

Lately he has acquired a large clientele because everything he sells is top quality and at affordable prices.  He wants to take advantage of the current vacation period to increase sales so he will increase stock in the business.

Manuel is a forward looking man who is determined to reach success.  He believes that what’s important is how much love we put into the work we do so that happiness will be greater that way.  

He’s had loans in the past and is a very good client.  This is why he’s decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan to buy clothes at wholesale and also some other personal use items like underwear, sandals, sun blockers, antiperspirants and lotions.  Manuel de Jesús trusts that increasing the variety of his products will lead to higher sales and he will thus be able to raise his beloved family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy clothes at wholesale and other personal use products.

loans.name: Abiba

texts.en:
Abiba sells dry and powdered pepper in Enyinase near Elmina. She has been doing this for three years. She is married to a farmer and has seven dependents. Abiba uses her income to support her husband to pay their accommodation and utility bills. 

Abiba will use her loan to purchase sacks of dry pepper to sell. With the new profit she will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of dry pepper to sell.

loans.name: Cate

texts.en:
Cate lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children, two of whom are in school. She also takes care of additional family members (her grand children). She sells charcoal from home on a retail basis. She has been in this business for the last twelve years. She works seven days a week. 

She has requested a loan of 400,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy bags of charcoal. Her major business challenges are seasonality and thieves. Her goals and aspirations are to become a wholesaler and also to buy a plot of land so as to build her own house. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity but does not have access to piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees, rent and food.

loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en:
Efua is involved in gari production. Gari is made out of cassava and for the past three years she has sold it in Enyinase near Elmina. She is married to a farmer and has three children. She uses her income to support her husband to pay their accommodation and utility bills. 

Efua will use her loan to purchase cassava to produce her gari to sell. With the new profit she will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase cassava to produce her gari to sell.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
This is sixty-two-year-old Marie.  She is divorced, and has four children aged forty-six, forty-four, forty-two and thirty-eight. In 1969, Marie established her business. She began her business because when her husband died, she had no way of making an income and her sister advised her to learn a trade. She started and improved gradually over the years. Working seven days a week and ten hours a day, she earns about SLL 2,500,000 every month from this business. 

She would like a loan for SLL 4,500,000. Marie has already received and successfully repaid one loan, and now requires a new loan in order to purchase white cotton fabric and raw materials so she can make tie-dye clothing to sell to retailers. In the future, Marie plans to open a school to teach this trade and as a result, help her students to be self-sufficient. The increase in price of raw material is her challenge. She is very hardworking and committed to her business.  She is looking forward to acquire subsequent loans in the future so that she can achieve her dream. 

She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To purchase white cotton fabric and raw materials to start making tie-dye clothing to sell to retailers.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.es: Florencia habita  en humilde casa de su propiedad ubicada en zona rural junto con sus queridos hijos. La señora Florencia se dedica junto a sus hijos a la agricultura desde hace muchos años. Los frijoles y el maíz son los principales cultivos que cada año cosecha. Esta actividad la realiza junto con sus hijos mayores que son los que se encargan de gran parte del trabajo dado que la señora Florencia también se dedica a las tareas del hogar como madre tradicional. Cultiva, cosecha y comercializa en el pueblo cercano a su localidad los granos básicos. De esta forma se gana la vida en esta actividad que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Para ella lo más importante es que su familia cuente con lo necesario para sobrevivir, esto es lo que la motiva a trabajar muy duro día con día para poder dar a su familia el pan de cada día y poder suplir las principales necesidades del hogar. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTGRAL para invertir en los insumos agrícolas  (abonos, venenos para plagas, semillas, etc.) que le permitan realizar la siembra de este año y poder obtener la mejor cosecha. Espera que los resultados sean favorables y pueda lograr su objetivo de dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida  a las que por el momento tienen ya que su situación es muy difícil económicamente.
texts.en:
Florencia lives with her beloved children in a modest house that she owns, located in a rural area.  Florencia has worked with her children in agriculture for many years.

Beans and corn are the main crops she harvests every year.  She does this work with her older children, who are the ones responsible for most of the work because Florencia also does the housework like a traditional mother.  She grows, harvests, and sells basic grains in the town near her community.

In this way she makes her living with this work that is her main source of income.  The most important thing for her is for her family to have what is necessary to survive.  This is what motivates her to work very hard every day to be able to give her family their daily bread and stock the main household necessities.

She has made the decision to request this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in agricultural supplies (fertilizer, pesticide, seed, etc.) that will allow her to do the planting this year and be able to get the best harvest.  She hope the results are favorable and she will be able to achieve her goal of giving her family better living conditions than those they have now, because her economic situation is very difficult.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticide, seed, etc.

loans.name: Antonio De Jesus

texts.es: Antonio de Jesús de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. El posee una venta de huevos y verdura, son muy conocidos en la zona ya que se dedican al comercio ambulante y porque todo lo que comercian es de primera calidad, fresco e higienico y lo vende a precios realmente accesible además el servicio es excelente; Antonio es un hombre inteligente con muchas metas a  futuro , piensa que hay que dejar que nuestra vida devore los sueños, y no sean los sueños quienes devoren nuestra vida, con este pensamiento se decidió a solicitarle  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar huevos por mayor y verduras. Antonio de Jesús tiene la confianza que de ésta forma sus ganancias mejoren y pueda darle a su familia una vida con mejor proyeccción de futuro
texts.en:
Antonio de Jesús, age 29, lives with his life partner and their children in his own house.  He has a business selling eggs and vegetables.  He is very well-known in the area because he sells in an itinerant manner.  He is also known because everything that he sells is of the highest quality, fresh, and hygienic.  He sells at very accessible prices, and his service is excellent.

Antonio is an intelligent man with a lot of goals for the future.  He thinks that we should not let our lives devour our dreams, and that it is not our dreams that ravage our lives.

It is with this thought that he decided to request a loan from Integral.  He will use the loan to buy wholesale eggs and vegetables.  Antonio de Jesús is confident that this is the way that his income will improve.  He will be able to give his family a life with a better future.

loans.use: to buy wholesale eggs and vegetables.

loans.name: Unidas Venceremos 2 Group

texts.en:
Martira is the coordinator of her group "Unidas venceremos 2" (Unite to win). Her group is located in Samana, a lush rugged peninsula with a nascent tourism industry. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her husband and their two children. She says that her most difficult challenge is to live well, she wants to have a successful business and her own safe and beautiful house. In the meantime she plans to continue enjoying watching television, especially Latin series.

Martira is excited to be taking her 13th loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for almost four years, though she has been selling clothing for more than five years, starting with the loans she received from Esperanza. Now she is running a bakery and this loan will be invested to buy flour, sugar, eggs, butter, and other goods to prepare cookies, sweets and bread. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business. She is very thankful for your support.

loans.use: To buy flour, sugar, eggs, butter, and other goods.

loans.name: Kaday

texts.en:
